careTips.title: Proper Hydration
careTips.description: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily for optimal recovery

careTips.title: Rest Periods
careTips.description: Take regular breaks between exercises to prevent fatigue

careTips.title: Sleep Schedule
careTips.description: Maintain a consistent sleep schedule of 7-8 hours per night

careTips.title: Nutrition Guide
careTips.description: Focus on protein-rich foods to support muscle recovery

careTips.title: Pain Management
careTips.description: Apply ice pack for 15-20 minutes after exercises
